# EMA multistakeholder workshop 06.07.2024

EMA invited industry to propose topics for discussion, of which ten were selected for discussion, see the agenda below. Most short talks were given by members of the [EFSPI statistical methodology leaders group](https://efspieurope.github.io/efspi/methods/methods_intro.html).

- [Agenda](events/20240607/20240607_EMA_multistakeholder_agenda.pdf).
- [All slidedecks](events/20240607/20240607_EMA_multistakeholder_slidedecks.zip).
- [Summary of discussions](events/20240607/20240607_EMA_multistakeholder_summary.pdf).
